channel.title: [RELEASE] Zakynthos | Where your dreams become Reality | Summoning | 317 | + MOR
channel.description:
[FONT=Arial Black]Hey guys, i'm releasing my server Zakynthos. this is because my vps got suspended and i can't get it back. I know that you'll all think oh another Virtue leech but tbh i've worked serveral hours on this, fixed the most bugs i could found, have fun with it:). For now i'll try to work and move on on Runesource.
There is a Anti-leech, [B]HINT: 2+2:2= ?[/B]
DO NOT RELEASE THE ANTI-LEECH ANSWER !!
If you're going to check this out/downloading/using please leave a [B][COLOR=red]REP![/COLOR][/B]
[U]Download link (server + client, auto cache download):[/U] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?vhawynycp476wdu]Zakynthos Package.rar[/url]
Here is the orginal advertisment thread: [QUOTE=AFG-;4092770][CENTER][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/27yzxud.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/28t9y0w.png[/img]Download link:[url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/j2jhehbvqs6v0jq/clientv2.jar]Download Zakynthos Client[/url] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/1498569.png[/img]Forums: [url=http://coming soon/]ZakynthosForums - Index[/url] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2h3zjae.png[/img]Webclient: [url=http://zakynthos1.webs.com/webclient]Zakynthos Webclient[/url]
[COLOR="#ADD8E6"][B]Features:[/B][/COLOR] Perfect switching All 317 skills Summoning Hunter Clan Chat Quests updated graphics Curses Alot of training areas. Good economy
[COLOR="#ADD8E6"][B]Media:[/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/r0a4ye.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/105y8oh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/dbfhx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/5nqhdd.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/k1dg7p.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2w5n0xe.png[/img] [/CENTER][/QUOTE]

item.dc:creator: @allowkid allowkid
item.description:
@allowkid wrote:

Whenever I try to run the server it always says Error: Could not find or load main class server.Server…

@echo off
title Project Insanity
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

item.title: [RELEASE] Zakynthos | Where your dreams become Reality | Summoning | 317 | + MOR
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

lol the “anti-leech” had me scratching my head for a moment. Haven’t worked with ratios in a long time.

oh and

Well since you have all been ignoring or just not understanding it so i'll make it clear here. Whenever you post a server or a client with the source code included you agree to the fact other people can use it. If you don't want people "Leeching" your work then you do not release it, simple as.

Please read the rules

[size=1pt]the answer is 3 if anybody needed to know[/size]

Read full topic
